content:
Prev: Jennifer steals third Up: Hot Shots vs Gold Rush Next: Breanna

Todd has a conference at the mound with Breanna



She struggled in the fourth inning, giving up three runs, but came out stronger in the fifth and ended up pitching the complete game, after having gone only two innings the previous game. There was some confusion mid-game about the pitching distance (the rubber was apparently placed incorrectly) and I think here Todd may be telling Breanna she can pitch closer than she had been.
Taken Saturday, April 03, 2004, 04:25:47pm.  Original image size: 2048x3072, 5.8Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/1250s @ F4.0, ISO 200, 70-200mm/F2.8+1.4x @ 240mm (384mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 5250:12, 0.5:7:50:60:0:25:5+M
